amendment.description: An amendment numbered 48 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to prohibit funding for the Interagency Working Group on the Social Cost of Greenhouse Gases.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.
